headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for Norfolk Southern
summary: Norfolk Southern’s stock narrative is shifting as the Fair Value Estimate has been revised downward from $312.53 to $311.63 per share. Recent street research reflects a nuanced mix of optimism and caution. Analysts are raising price targets based on the strength of resilient earnings and operational consistency, even as the transportation sector faces broader challenges. Stay tuned to discover how investors and observers can keep ahead of the evolving story shaping Norfolk Southern’s...
